`func` - tools for function development

## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("sckott/func")
```

```{r}
library('func')
```

## usage

```{r}
mars <- function() 5
venus <- function(z = mars(), m = list(goo = "bar"), v = function(e) e) {
  list(z, z, v)
}
mars()
venus()
z
m
v
func_load(venus)
class(z); z
class(m); m
class(v); v
```
